result.eng: The wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.
result.ga: Bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadan
result.orig: Bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadan
result.html: Bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadanThe wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cuma ní ba ḋoiṁne ar na roic ina éadanThe wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.

result.eng: Where did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?
result.ga: Cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadan
result.orig: Cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadan
result.html: Cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadanWhere did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?
result.ponchtml: Cad as ar ṫáinig na roic ina éadanWhere did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?

result.eng: Her hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ga: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.orig: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.html: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteachHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a cuid gruaige greamaiṫe dá baiṫis ag an mbáisteaċHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
